page.title: 12Nuthurst Brownies
page.content: The{Brownies}started over fifty years ago. Our pack meets at the{school}from 5.00-6.30pm on{Thursdays.}There are 24 Brownies, 6 in each pack. The packs are called: Pixies, Gnomes, Leprechauns and Imps. Our guider is called Mrs Hempstead, we call her{Blue {Flash.}Mrs Hazel is{Barn Owl}and there are two pack leaders called Charlotte and Jocelyn. After three years you leave the Brownies and go up to the Guides. The adventures we go on are the{Brownie camp}and the{Brownie {revels.}The Brownie revels were held last year at Billingshurst on a farm - it was fun. The camp last year was held at Blackland Farm, Lancing. We collect milk bottle tops and foil to help pay for a{guide dog}for the blind.
